item.description:
I'm hosting game night once again at my home in Concord, but because I have an appointment on Monday that will keep me out late, I'm hosting game night on Sunday, March 28, starting at 7 pm and running until whenever. I realize the late notice of this unexpected day might throw people off, but if you can make it, I'd be happy to see you here.

I'd like to play Macao again or perhaps Homesteaders or Terra Prime. Mike put in a request for Medici or Galaxy Trucker. Lots of possibilities for what can hit the table. Let me know whether you have requests, too, and I hope to see you here.

Eric
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH â€“ special Sunday event
